descriptor.name: Lay's American Style Cream And Onion Potato Chips, 52 g
descriptor.long_desc:
Lays Potato Chips - American Style has the ultimate true American taste. Packed with cream and onion, they will prove to be a tasty treat for you and your friends.

- Only the best ingredients are used, which makes the chips quite big on taste
- Ideal party snack, these chips are especially good to enjoy with a nice beverage
-Delicious individual bags: perfect for snacking at work, home or school

About the Brand: Lay's is one of the world's most recognizable brands of potato chips and a subsidiary of the Frito-Lay corporation. Lay's has been around for over 80 years and come in a wide range of localized flavors in countries like India to suit varied palates: classic flavors like Sour Cream and Onion and Classic Salted continue to do well.

descriptor.name: Lay's Stax Jalapeno Pepper Jack Potato Crisps, 155.9 g
descriptor.long_desc:
Lay's Stax Jalapeno Pepper Jack potato crisps give you the full flavour and crispy crunch that add great taste to your busy day. Enjoy Lay's Stax at the office, around the house or wherever you are. It's ideal for sharing with friends, family or colleagues.

- Flavoured potato crisps are the ultimate way to unwind
- Plastic canister designed for convenience and ultimate chip protection
- Convenient snack while on the go or relaxing at home

About the Brand: An industry leader in foodservice solutions, Frito-Lay serves operators and distributors throughout the U.S. Whether you’re looking for grab-and-go vending solutions, customizable nachos on campus, or wholegrain treats for healthcare settings, Lay's has got snacking covered.

descriptor.name: Lay's American Style Sour Cream And Onion Potato Chips, 78 g
descriptor.short_desc:
- Open the pack and consume the product.

Country of Origin: India
descriptor.long_desc:
With their flavours as rich as their history, Lays American Sour Cream Onlion are loved in all celebrations. These much favoured chips are fun to enjoy at lunch, as an after- school snack, or party refreshment. Grab a pack, and enjoy this tasty snack!

- Trans- fat free potato chips
- Made from the fiNest quality of spices and edible vegetable oils
- 100% vegetarian snacks

About the Brand: Lay’s is the world’s largest and favourite snack food brand. It has steadily established itself as an indispensable part of India’s snacking culture since its launch in 1995. With its irresistible taste, international and Indian flavours, Lay’s has established itself as a youth brand and continues to grow in the hearts and mind of its consumers. Lay’s is made with India’s best- quality fresh potatoes, simply sliced and cooked in edible vegetable oils, and then seasoned with delicious flavours!

descriptor.name: Lay's Stax Que Rico Chile Limon Flavored Potato Crisps, 155.9 g
descriptor.long_desc:
Lays Stax Que Rico Crunchy Potato Crisp gives you the full flavor that you have been looking for. Nothing stacks up to the timeless taste of Lays Stacks Que Rico potato crisps. The best thing about potato crisps is that unlike regular potato chips all crisps are identical in shape and size. So there is uniformity, in every single crisp. 

- Flavoured potato crisps are the ultimate way to unwind
- Plastic canister designed for convenience and ultimate chip protection
- Convenient snack while on the go or relaxing at home

About the Brand: An industry leader in foodservice solutions, Frito-Lay serves operators and distributors throughout the U.S. Whether you’re looking for grab-and-go vending solutions, customizable nachos on campus, or wholegrain treats for healthcare settings, Lay's has got snacking covered.

descriptor.name: Lay's Stax Original Potato Crisps, 163 g
descriptor.long_desc:
Nothing stacks up to the timeless taste of Lay's Stax Original Potato Crisps. This crunchy potato crisp gives you the full flavor that you have been looking for. Your taste buds will thank you.

- Flavoured potato crisps are the ultimate way to unwind
- Plastic canister designed for convenience and ultimate chip protection
- Convenient snack while on the go or relaxing at home

About the Brand: An industry leader in foodservice solutions, Frito-Lay serves operators and distributors throughout the U.S. Whether you’re looking for grab-and-go vending solutions, customizable nachos on campus, or wholegrain treats for healthcare settings, Lay's has got snacking covered.

descriptor.name: Lay's Stax Salt and Vinegar Potato Crisps, 155.9 g
descriptor.long_desc:
Dive into the tart and tangy taste of Lay's Stax Salt & Vinegar artificially flavored potato crisps. One bite and you'll see that nothing else stacks up.

- Flavoured potato crisps are the ultimate way to unwind
- Plastic canister designed for convenience and ultimate chip protection
- Convenient snack while on the go or relaxing at home

About the Brand: An industry leader in foodservice solutions, Frito-Lay serves operators and distributors throughout the U.S. Whether you’re looking for grab-and-go vending solutions, customizable nachos on campus, or wholegrain treats for healthcare settings, Lay's has got snacking covered.

descriptor.name: Lay's Stax Cheddar Cheese Potato Crisps, 155.9 g
descriptor.long_desc:
Lay's Stax Cheddar flavored potato crisps are the ultimate way to unwind. They deliver a hearty crunch that will be sure to put a smile on your face. Go ahead and make your day.

- Flavoured potato crisps are the ultimate way to unwind
- Plastic canister designed for convenience and ultimate chip protection
- Convenient snack while on the go or relaxing at home

About the Brand: An industry leader in foodservice solutions, Frito-Lay serves operators and distributors throughout the U.S. Whether you’re looking for grab-and-go vending solutions, customizable nachos on campus, or wholegrain treats for healthcare settings, Lay's has got snacking covered.

descriptor.name: Lay's Stax Sour Cream and Onion Potato Crisps, 155.9 g
descriptor.long_desc:
Looking for a creamy, zesty delight? You've come to the right spot. Lay's Stax Sour Cream & Onion are naturally and artificially flavored potato crisps that are the perfect snack when you want to take a time out.

- Flavoured potato crisps are the ultimate way to unwind
- Plastic canister designed for convenience and ultimate chip protection
- Convenient snack while on the go or relaxing at home

About the Brand: An industry leader in foodservice solutions, Frito-Lay serves operators and distributors throughout the U.S. Whether you’re looking for grab-and-go vending solutions, customizable nachos on campus, or wholegrain treats for healthcare settings, Lay's has got snacking covered.
